content: this shawlette has a very simple shape and its size can be easily adjusted i decided to make it asymetrical with wide colorful stripes on one edge but you can of course experiment with the colors and and more stripes or even work this shawlette with one colour only this shawlette can be worn in a variety of different ways to see them please check this 1 blog post pattern is written for one size but you can easily adjust it my shawlette turned to be approx 180cm 72in long and 27cm 10 1/2 in wide in the widest part with border the pattern is easy to follow and is aimed to beginners i hope you will like it and please share the pictures of your finished shawlette with me in my ravelry group here 2 i would love to hear from you 1 http //www lillabjorncrochet com/2016/02/my-first-shawlette-design html 2 http //www ravelry com/groups/lilla-bjorn-crochet
